document.full_text: iraq's ministry of electricity and iranian power development firm sunir inaugurated a $150 million, 320-megawatt power plant in baghdad on sunday that should boost iraq's feeble electricity supply.
document.title: iraq fires up new power plant in baghdad
lines_and_colors: iraq's ministry of electricity and iranian power development firm sunir inaugurated a $150 million, 320-megawatt power plant in baghdad on sunday that should boost iraq's feeble electricity supply.
